TopicTitle: Vehicle crew option. Save crew type!(Pilot, Science, Engineer)

Articles.Content:
How about the option to auto save the type of kerbal to go in each slot in a vehicle. Say you want 2 pilots 2 engineers and 2 scientists. Instead of saving individual kerbals that may or not be available how about the type of kerbal by profession.

On top of this you could set min rank and other features available on each kerbal so it can be auto filled with these features if the normal kerbal is not available and customize the crew more for a vehicle.
It would be rather good when you have your proven workhorse setting into various designations at the same time.

Heck, I'd settle for being able to designate empty seats!

(I've lost track of the number of times that I've launched a rescue ship to pick up a stranded kerbal for a contract, and get it all the way up in orbit next to the poor feller, and he tries to climb in and ... "Cannot board a full module." ARGH!)
